contact.text: For any information request, send us an

texte.zone1: JUMEL CONSULTING is a simplified joint-stock company with a single shareholder with a share capital of € 3,000. The company is identified in the Paris Trade and Companies Register (RCS) under number 805 077 617. Its head office is located at 91 bld Soult 75012 Paris.
JUMEL CONSULTING is committed to ensuring that the collection and processing of your data complies with the General Data Protection Regulations (RGPD) and the Data Protection Act.
texte.zone2: The purpose of the personal data collected is to process your request for information made on the site.
texte.zone3: In application of the Data Protection Act of January 6, 1978, you have the right to access, rectify, modify and delete data concerning you.

zone4.div: You can exercise this right in several ways:

ul.li1: By sending an email to julien.rivat@jumel-consulting.com
ul.li2: By sending a letter to Jumel Consulting 91 bld Soult 75012 Paris
